name: OCKListViewController
desc: A view controller that displays views in a list view.

items.name: func appendViewController(UIViewController, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Appends a view controller's view to the vertical stack of listed views.

items.name: func appendView(UIView, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Appends a view to the vertical stack of listed views.

items.name: func insertViewController(UIViewController, at: Int, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Inserts a view controllers view at a specific index, and sets up containment for the view controller.

items.name: func insertView(UIView, at: Int, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Inserts a view into the vertical stack of list views at a specific index.

items.name: func remove(at: Int)
items.desc: Removes the view located at a specific index.

items.name: func clear()
items.desc: Removes all displayed views without animation.
